commit.message:
cmake: add cuda deps for downstream packages (#1062)

Added find_dependency calls which mirror find_package in cmake/HYPRE_SetupCUDAToolkit.cmake.
Without this the downstream app has to add the same dependency paths as the hypre build

commit.message:
Add iterative ILU0 (#1011)

This PR adds an interface to the iterative ILU algorithm with zero fill-in implemented in rocSPARSE.

The method is iterative in the context of the factorization phase. It works only in device runs (AMD). It can be used as preconditioner or complex smoother to BoomerAMG. Detailed list of changes:

* Add hypre_ILUSetupIterativeILU0Device
* Add Iterative ILU options to ILU's data structure
* Make use of iterative ILU options in IJ driver
* Add iterative ILU statistics
* Add BoomerAMG interface for using the new iterative ILU as complex smoother
* Turn on residuals when asking for conv. history

verification.payload:
tree f1122aab09b3a8ef2649a2b6c6c2bca9a18c8b85
parent a4a924a6e7ddcf57fa76824bf23a577d977e271d
author Victor A. P. Magri <50467563+victorapm@users.noreply.github.com> 1706064847 -0500
committer GitHub <noreply@github.com> 1706064847 -0500

Add iterative ILU0 (#1011)

This PR adds an interface to the iterative ILU algorithm with zero fill-in implemented in rocSPARSE.

The method is iterative in the context of the factorization phase. It works only in device runs (AMD). It can be used as preconditioner or complex smoother to BoomerAMG. Detailed list of changes:

* Add hypre_ILUSetupIterativeILU0Device
* Add Iterative ILU options to ILU's data structure
* Make use of iterative ILU options in IJ driver
* Add iterative ILU statistics
* Add BoomerAMG interface for using the new iterative ILU as complex smoother
* Turn on residuals when asking for conv. history

commit.message:
Improve MGR robustness (#1040)

Improve MGR robustness when Gaussian Elimination is used as F-relaxation. A new logic has been added: If GE fails, then fall back to Jacobi. List of changes:

* Add HYPRE_GetGlobalError
* Reduce allocation sizes
* Improve robustness of F-relaxation option in MGR
* Fix memory leak that happens when GE fails
* Add hypre_error_code_save/restore

verification.payload:
tree 10a45823cfa58e7e015ec2982d1aa78313bbd929
parent 41abcabd06e23dc440606b892dd2b988fbd40533
author Victor A. P. Magri <50467563+victorapm@users.noreply.github.com> 1704744346 -0500
committer GitHub <noreply@github.com> 1704744346 -0500

Improve MGR robustness (#1040)

Improve MGR robustness when Gaussian Elimination is used as F-relaxation. A new logic has been added: If GE fails, then fall back to Jacobi. List of changes:

* Add HYPRE_GetGlobalError
* Reduce allocation sizes
* Improve robustness of F-relaxation option in MGR
* Fix memory leak that happens when GE fails
* Add hypre_error_code_save/restore
